fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Rishi Sunak’s constituency home is near Northallerton, not North Allerton as we incorrectly spelled it (After a rapid rise, has ‘the next PM’ already peaked?, 7 November, page 24). • An examination of Mario Puzo’s novel The Godfather incorrectly described the Corleone crime family’s scion Michael as wearing “the uniform of the US army”; the Marine Corps is the branch of the military in which he enlists (31 October, page 24, Review). • Other recently amended articles include: The house that cork built: is this the ultimate eco-friendly material? Cambodian PM isolating after Covid outbreak linked to Hungarian minister What will Mike Pence do next after Trump’s election loss? Food banks a ‘sticking plaster’ as UK demand skyrockets, warns charity head My joyous return to The West Wing
